Author: CrisF#3405
Content:
Hi, Will `z_mergetoaddress` still work?
I've been having trouble for for quite a long time with ```z_mergetoaddress '["*"]'```Also no luck with ```z_mergetoaddress "ANY_TADDR"
or
z_mergetoaddress "*"``` Any suggestions?

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: `z_mergetoaddress ["fromaddress", ... ] "toaddress" ( fee ) ( transparent_limit ) ( shielded_limit ) ( memo )`

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content:
```Arguments:
1. fromaddresses         (string, required) A JSON array with addresses.
                         The following special strings are accepted inside the array:
                             - "*": Merge both UTXOs and notes from all addresses belonging to the wallet.
                             - "ANY_TADDR": Merge UTXOs from all t-addrs belonging to the wallet.
                             - "ANY_ZADDR": Merge notes from all z-addrs belonging to the wallet.
                         If a special string is given, any given addresses of that type will be ignored.
    [
      "address"          (string) Can be a t-addr or a z-addr
      ,...
    ]
2. "toaddress"           (string, required) The t-addr or z-addr to send the funds to.
```

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: try `z_mergetoaddress ["*"] "destinationaddress"`

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: https://developers.komodoplatform.com/basic-docs/komodo-api/wallet.html#z-mergetoaddress

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: not 100% sure how to enable tho....

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: try through Agama CLI with experimental features activated?

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content:
Hello,
In Eth, you have one wallet which holds your private keys and it gives you full access to all the tokens. I mean that I don't have to create a new wallet for each "asset" hosted on Eth. The main drawback of that is that it's quite confusing.
With KMD, AFAIK, each new project means a new system priv/public key. In other world I have to create a new wallet (by "wallet" I mean "a set of public/private keys")  if I want to hold some pirate coins....and to create a new wallet if I want to hold some verus coins... and so and so

Author: riseandfall#3726
Content: The use of Ledger hardware wallet with agama wallet is so useful only for using Komodo....and we will have to wait for the moment there is a ledger app for pirate coin and a ledger app for versus coin...and so and so
